Level_5_Sentences: The thunder rolls across the dark valley.
My voice carries the weight of authority.
Breathe deep and speak from the diaphragm.
The resonance of the earth moves through me.
Command the room with every spoken word.
Level_6_Resonance_Drills: The mountain stands firm beneath my voice.
Strength flows from my chest into sound.
I speak with the weight of stone.
My chest vibrates like a drum of thunder.
The power of my voice begins in my chest.
Breath rises from my belly with force.
The belly anchors the depth of my tone.
I push sound upward from the core.
My belly fuels the strength of my words.
The foundation of my voice lies in my belly.
The diaphragm releases steady waves of sound.
I control my breath with calm strength.
Each word rides the air from my diaphragm.
The diaphragm expands to carry my voice.
I breathe deep, and my diaphragm guides the tone.
My throat opens wide to let sound settle.
The base of my throat anchors my voice.
I speak from the depth of my throat.
The throat base resonates with calm power.
Sound rests low, steady, and strong.
